text.name: Yearning - Mircalla
text.desc:
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 while using this Skill.
Clash Power +1 for every 100 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] At less than 50 [BloodDinner], inflict 1 [Laceration] with every Hit
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End.
coinDescs: At 100+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation]: deal +0.1% damage for every value (max 10%)
At 200+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation]: deal +0.1% damage for every value (max 20%)
At 300+ [BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation]: deal +0.1% damage for every value (max 30%)
[WinDuelAttack] Inflict [ThirstyRose] based on the highest Lust A-Reson. (max 3)

passiveList.name: Spiring Crimson Blossom
passiveList.desc: Every time 10+ [Laceration] damage occurs, heal 1 SP on self (10 per turn)

text.name: Yearning - Mircalla
text.desc:

Targets randomly
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 while using this Skill.
If target has 10+ [Laceration], Coin Power -1

[BeforeAttack] Gain 20 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] on self immediately. Lose 2 [Laceration] Count
